Name: Tennessee Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: The Whiskey Sour was first published in Jerry Thomas' How to Mix Drinks or the Bon Vivant's Companion in 1862. The Jack Daniels distillery was established and registered just four years later.
Nutrition: One serving of Tennessee Sour contains 193 calories
